
# Sample/Feauture Basic Statistics

## Sample Stats Table

```{r echo = FALSE, warning=FALSE, message = FALSE, fig.width = 10, fig.height = 8}
if(is.null(r_data$cellset)) return()
    DT::datatable(as.data.frame(pData(r_data$cellset)), selection = 'single', options = list(
        scrollX = T, scrollY = "400px", lengthMenu = c(20, 50, 100)
    )
    )

```

## Feature Stats Table

```{r echo = FALSE, warning=FALSE, message = FALSE, fig.width = 10, fig.height = 8}
     if(is.null(r_data$cellset)) return()
    ftbl <-as.data.frame(fData(r_data$cellset))
    ftbl <- ftbl[, -which(names(ftbl) %in% c("use_for_ordering", "gene_short_name"))]
    DT::datatable(ftbl, selection = 'single', options = list(
        scrollX = T, scrollY = "400px", lengthMenu = c(20, 50, 100)
    )
    )
```
